actions.description: The pech makes two Fortified Pickaxe attacks. If it hits a Large or smaller creature with both attacks, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) force damage. If the target is a Construct or an object, the attack is automatically a critical hit.
actions.name: Fortified Pickaxe

actions.description: The pech casts Stone Shape, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.
actions.name: Stone Shape (3/Day)

actions.description:
The pech works with three or more pechs to cast spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (save DC 12). If at least three other pechs are within 30 feet of it, the pech can cast Wall of Stone . If at least seven other pechs are within 30 feet of it, it can cast Greater Restoration . Each other pech involved in casting the spell can't have the incapacitated condition and must have at least one use of Communal Spellcasting remaining, which it must immediately expend to participate (no action required).
2/day each: Wall of Stone, Greater Restoration
actions.name: Communal Spellcasting (2/Day)

specialTraits.description: The pech has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: While in sunlight, the pech has disadvantage on attack rolls.
specialTraits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
